settingsexplanation: Re hlompha qeto ya hao. Empa ho hlokahala tumello e hlokahalang e le hore sesebelisoa se ka sebetsa. Haeba o ntse o lakatsa ho Dumella Tumello, o ka latela mehato ena:
settingssteps:
1. Bula Litlhophiso tsa App.

2. Eya ho Ditumello.

3.Dumella tumello bakeng sa tshebeletso e hlokehang.

4. Khutlela ho sesebelisoa 'me u kenye leqephe hape.
reportdesc: Bolela seo u amehileng ka sona mona
reportsuccess: Tlaleho ea hau e rometsoe ho Admin ka katleho. Admin o tla e hlahloba haufinyane 'me a nke khato e hlokahalang ha ho hlokahala

backupdesc: Lintlha tsohle tsa Lipuisano le Mecha ea litaba li t≈°ehelitsoe ka bohona ho li-server tsa maru tse sireletsehileng 'me li hokahanngoa ho lisebelisoa tsohle tsa hau. U ka tsoela pele ho qoqa u sebelisa sesebelisoa leha e le sefe, neng kapa neng.

raiserequestdesc: Kenya kopo ho Mookameli hore a hlakole Account. Ak'haonte ea hau e tla hlakoloa nakong ea matsatsi a 5.
